short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Yours one and only SEO tool

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SEO Scraper is an irreplaceable tool for anyone interested with effective website optimization for SEO purposes. This intuitive plugin allows for quick and convenient browsing and analysis of key On-Page SEO elements without the need to switch between different tools or pages.

Our key features are:
- You can easily access important data about the page, such as: URL, title, description, meta tags, canonical, and the number of images on the page.
- Highlight links and headers on your page, so you know where they are located on page
- Every highlight will scroll you to them, so you will not have to search for them
- Customize colors of highlights!
- Search throught links and headers of your page with our find tool, which significantly facilitate work
- You can download a compilation of links and headers in .csv format for further analysis.
- Accidentaly closed extension when you were analysing some website? No problem! SEO Scraper remembers your highlights per page, so when you turn it on again, your highlights will be there.
- SEO Analysis of page title and description, so you will know if its too long

SEO Scraper is not just a tool that facilitates data analysis, but also speeds up the decision-making process regarding website optimization. This allows you to quickly identify areas that need improvement and effectively work towards increasing the visibility and position of the website in search results.

Here are the instructions for launching the plugin:

- ensure that the plugin is installed and activated in your browser.
- before launching the SEO Scraper plugin, open the sidebar panel. You can do this by selecting "More" -> "Settings" -> "Appearance" -> In the "Sidebar" section, choose the page where you want the panel to appear.
- alternatively, you can enable the sidebar panel by right-clicking on the plugin icon and selecting the "Sidebar" option.

Install SEO Scraper today and gain an advantage in optimizing your site for SEO!
All that for free!
